ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Almighty, the All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: THE REVELATION OF this Book is from God, the mighty and all-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The revelation of this Book is from Allah, the Most Mighty, the Most Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This Book is a revelation from God, the Majestic and All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Most Honourable, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The revelation of this Book is from Allah, the Almighty, the All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Mighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The sending down of the Book is from God the All-mighty, the All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The revelation of the Scripture is from Allah, the Mighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This Book is sent down by God the Mighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The revelation of this Book is from Allah, the Mighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The [gradual] sending down of the Book is from Allah, the All-mighty, the All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The revelation of this Book is from Allah, the Exalted in Power, full of Wisdom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The revelation of this Book (the Quran) is from Allah, the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The sending down of the Book is from Allah, the Almighty, the Wise,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The revelation of the Book is from God, the Mighty and Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The revelation of the Qur'an is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [39:1] The revelation of the Book, the Qur’ān (tanzīlu’l-kitābi, the subject) is from God (mina’Llāhi, its predicate) the Mighty, in His kingdom, the Wise, in His handiwork.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said regarding the interpretation of Allah's saying: (The revelation of the Scripture): '(The revelation of the Scripture is) He says: this Scripture is an address (from Allah, the Mighty) in retribution against those who disbelieve in Him, (the Wise) in His command and decree; He commanded that none should be worshipped except Him.
